ippoz.reload.metric

Class Metric

  • java.lang.Object
    • ippoz.reload.metric.Metric
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Metric>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ScoringMetric

    public abstract class Metric
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Metric>
    The Class Metric. Defines a base metric. Needs to be extended from concrete metrics' classes.
    Author:
    Tommy
